languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт следит за происходящим немного завороженно, почти околдованно.{/n} "Как просто вы предаете своих собратьев погибели страшнее смерти..."
{n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт следит за происходящим немного завороженно, почти околдованно.{/n} "Как просто вы предаете своих собратьев погибели страшнее смерти..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, comme envoûtée, observe la scène avec une fascination manifeste.{/n} « Comme il semble aisé pour vous d'abandonner les vôtres à un destin pire que la mort... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, comme envoûtée, observe la scène avec une fascination manifeste.{/n} « Comme il semble aisé pour vous d'abandonner les vôtres à un destin pire que la mort... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、この光景が繰り広げられるのを、まるで魔法にかけられたかのように、夢中になって見ていた。{/n}「自分の同胞を死よりも悲惨な運命に陥れるとは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、この光景が繰り広げられるのを、まるで魔法にかけられたかのように、夢中になって見ていた。{/n}「自分の同胞を死よりも悲惨な運命に陥れるとは…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看着眼前的一幕，几乎像是着了迷一样，似乎根本无法移开视线。{/n}“没想到，你居然会这么轻轻松松地惩罚你的族人，让他陷入比死亡更加可怕的命运……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看着眼前的一幕，几乎像是着了迷一样，似乎根本无法移开视线。{/n}“没想到，你居然会这么轻轻松松地惩罚你的族人，让他陷入比死亡更加可怕的命运……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet beobachtet das Geschehen fasziniert, wie verzaubert gar.{/n} "Wie schnell Ihr Euer Blut zu einem schlimmeren Schicksal als dem Tod verdammt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet beobachtet das Geschehen fasziniert, wie verzaubert gar.{/n} "Wie schnell Ihr Euer Blut zu einem schlimmeren Schicksal als dem Tod verdammt ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet observa la situación con algo que podría definirse como fascinación, casi hechizada por lo que ve.{/n} «Con qué facilidad condenáis a vuestra gente a un fin peor que la muerte...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, hayranlık denebilecek bir duyguyla olanları izliyor. Âdeta büyülenmiş.{/n} "Kendi soyundan birini ölümden beter bu kadere ne de kolay terk ediyorsun..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet watches this scene unfold with something that can be described as fascination, practically spellbound.{/n} "How easily you commit your kin to a demise worse than death..."
